content:
This chunk initializes a Panda3D application by importing the `base` object from ShowBaseGlobal and the `WxPandaShell` class, then setting up the application environment.

from direct.showbase.ShowBaseGlobal import base
from .WxPandaShell import WxPandaShell
base.app = WxPandaShell()  # type: ignore[attr-defined]
